detaileddescription.para: This class implements a simple clarinet physical model, as discussed by Smith (1986), McIntyre, Schumacher, Woodhouse (1983), and others.
This is a digital waveguide model, making its use possibly subject to patents held by Stanford University, Yamaha, and others.

Control Change Numbers:
Reed Stiffness = 2
Noise Gain = 4
Vibrato Frequency = 11
Vibrato Gain = 1
Breath Pressure = 128
by Perry R. Cook and Gary P. Scavone, 1995 - 2005.
